subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn won a World Cup super-G on Sunday in Bansko, Bulfaria, taking the career leader in the discipline with 18 titles.
snippet: Lindsey Vonn won a World Cup super-G on Sunday in Bansko, Bulfaria, taking the career leader in the discipline with 18 titles.
